name: 11.22 "It's Lonely at the Top" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Did Rebecca say she could handle calling the agency to hire a new waitress?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Then she told Sam to dial because she just did her nails. Then she asked him to talk because she felt uncomfortable talking to strangers.

questions.text: What was the new drink that Carla made?
questions.explanation:
I Know My Redeemer Liveth.

	Sam didn't want her make her special drink because of what happened last time. Among other things, Phil tried to join the Flying Wendellas.

questions.text: Who said, "It's official I have a problem"?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Frasier came to the bar hungover. He said he had a problem because he got so drunk the night before and was back at the bar seven hours later.

questions.text: Who got drunk and slept in the office?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	He didn't know where he was when he woke up. Sam had him describe what he saw and then told him he was in the office.

questions.correct: She slept with someone, but didn't know who.
questions.explanation:
She slept with someone, but didn't know who.

	She had slept with many men but always knew who it was. The only thing she remembered was drinking and having sex with a guy from Cheers.

Paul.

	While Carla was upset and didn't want people to know, Paul wanted to tell everyone. Sam talked Paul out of telling the other guys.

questions.text: How did Sam convince the man that slept with Carla not to tell?
questions.correct: He asked him to crow in front of Sam to get it out of his system.
options: He threatened to do bodily harm if he talked.
He paid him to keep his mouth shut.
questions.explanation:
He asked him to crow in front of Sam to get it out of his system.

	Paul said it wouldn't be easy not telling everyone. Then he started cheering for himself.

questions.text: What did the man ask Sam to do regarding Carla?
options: Avoid Carla for a while so she doesn't know he told her.
Set Carla up with him again.
Tell her that Paul loved her.
questions.explanation:
Let Carla down gently.

	Paul said, "Paulie don't need no clinging vines". Sam said he'd let Carla down gently, which would be easy since Paul repulsed Carla.

questions.text: Where did Norm and Cliff get their tattoos?
questions.explanation:
butts.

	Norm's tattoo was an American flag with the words "God bless the US Post Office". Cliff's tattoo was a big heart with the words "I love Vera." The tattoo artist got them mixed up obviously.

questions.correct: Sam & Sam Malone & Malone & Mayday & Mayday Malone
questions.explanation:
Sam & Sam Malone & Malone & Mayday & Mayday Malone.

	Sam called it  "a hair replacement system". Sam said he started losing his hair on August 12, 1989. While people knew by this point that Ted Danson wore a hairpiece no one expected Sam to, so it caused great laughter when he took his hair off and shock as well.
